item.title: NHNC 2025 CTF - Attacking YOLOv8 vs YOLOv10: Adversarial CNN Misclassification
item.author: mohamed.anaddam@outlook.com (azadin)
item.description: Can you bypass the login form? Title Attack CCN? Description Did u know how to attack CNN? Category Machine Learning / Adversarial Attacks Points 500 Difficulty Medium Maker kohiro Summary Attack CCN: In this challenge, we explored the vulnerabilities of two object detection models, YOLOv8 and YOLOv10 by crafting an adversarial image that causes the models to disagree on predictions with a significant confidence gap. Using insights gleaned from their confusion matrices, we identified weak spots in classification consistency and exploited them using image transformations like noise injection, blurring, color shifting, and rotations.
item.dc:creator: azadin
